snoopy.blindnote: (20100707末安)snoRNABaseを参考にsequenceを5'側から1nt短くし、3'側から1nt短くした,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Smith, C. M., and Steitz, J. A. (1998). Classification of gas5 as a multi-small-nucleolar-RNA (snoRNA) host gene and a member of the 5'-terminal oligopyrimidine gene family reveals common features of snoRNA host genes. Mol Cell Biol 18, 6897-6909. Nakamura, Y., Takahashi, N., Kakegawa, E., Yoshida, K., Ito, Y., Kayano, H., Niitsu, N., Jinnai, I., and Bessho, M. (2008). The GAS5 (growth arrest-specific transcript 5) gene fuses to BCL6 as a result of t(1;3)(q25;q27) in a patient with B-cell lymphoma. Cancer Genet Cytogenet 182, 144-149.
